entities.name: seamus
entities.description: Seamus is mentioned as the one who reckons Harry's lying about You-Know-Who. He is part of a conversation with Ron and Harry.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as the one who says Seamus reckons Harry's lying about You-Know-Who. He is part of a conversation with Seamus and Harry.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character in the conversation. He is accused by Lavender and Seamus of lying about You-Know-Who.

entities.name: lavender
entities.description: Lavender is mentioned as someone who thinks Harry's lying about You-Know-Who. She has a conversation with Hermione about it.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as the one who reacts calmly to Harry's situation and tells Lavender to keep her mouth shut.

entities.name: you-know-who
entities.description: You-Know-Who is a mysterious entity that Harry is accused of lying about. It is not explicitly mentioned what You-Know-Who refers to.

relationships.description: Seamus accuses Harry of lying about You-Know-Who. This is mentioned by Ron in the conversation.
Lavender also thinks that Harry's lying about You-Know-Who, as mentioned by Hermione in the conversation.
Hermione advises Lavender to keep her mouth shut regarding Harry's situation.
